Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.ajilore.code.controllers.AdminController
public class AdminController extends Object
AdminController handles all administrative operations. Provides methods for browsing and removing events, users, and images. Implements US 03.04.01 (Browse Events), US 03.05.01 (Browse Users), and US 03.01.01 (Remove Events).

    Class

    static interface

    Generic data fetch callback with type and error reporting.
    static interface

    Generic operation callback for CRUD/remove operations.

      public AdminController()
      Constructs an AdminController and connects to Firestore and Storage.

  • Method Details

    • fetchAllEvents

      public void fetchAllEvents(AdminController.DataCallback<List<Event>> callback)
      Fetches all event documents from Firestore.

      User Story:

      • US 03.04.01 - Browse Events
      Parameters:
      callback - DataCallback returning list of events or an error.

    • fetchAllUsers

      public void fetchAllUsers(AdminController.DataCallback<List<User>> callback)
      Fetches all user profiles from Firestore.

      User Story:

      • US 03.05.01 - Browse Users/Profiles
      Parameters:
      callback - DataCallback returning the user list or error.

    • removeEvent

      public void removeEvent(String eventId, AdminController.OperationCallback callback)
      Removes an event and corresponding poster image from Firestore and Storage.

      User Story:

      • US 03.01.01 - Remove Events
      Parameters:
      eventId - Event document id to delete.
      callback - OperationCallback for success/error handling.

    • removeUser

      public void removeUser(String userId, AdminController.OperationCallback callback)
      Removes a user profile from Firestore. Extend this method to remove user's events, waiting list entries, or extra cleanup as needed.
      Parameters:
      userId - User's document ID.
      callback - OperationCallback for success/error.
